abstract.para: This document contains information regarding the OSGi Plugin functionality and integration in the OLAS product.

chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: OLAS provides an OSGi plugin attribute service API that can be used to extend OLAS with exeternal attributes. During the creation of attribute types in OLAS, the operator can select the plugin providing the attribute. As implementation of the OSGi R4 Service Platform we are using Apache Felix.

chapter.title: Plugin Service API
chapter.para: To create a new OSGi plugin bundle, you need to implement the interface PluginAttributeService . This interface has one method: getAttribute(String userId, String attributeName, String configuration) .
